App.title: Mi Po
App.description: An emergency situation building resident system

Auth.description: Join a building or create a new one,
Auth.existingBuilding: If you disconnected by mistake you can log in to your existing building

CreateBuilding.phoneStepDescription: Enter your phone number to get started
CreateBuilding.canRequestNewCode: You can request a new code

JoinBuilding.joinStepDescription: Enter your details to join a building
JoinBuilding.canRequestNewCode: You can request a new code

LoginBuilding.canRequestNewCode: You can request a new code

BuildingPage.noResidents: No residents found. Invite people to join your building!

InviteDialog.title: Invite to Building
InviteDialog.qrCodeDescription: Scan this QR code to join the building
InviteDialog.shareCodeDescription: Share this code for manual entry on the join page

Tooltips.phoneNumberCreate: Enter your phone number to receive a verification code via SMS. This will be used to verify your identity as the building owner.
Tooltips.phoneNumberLogin: Enter the phone number associated with your account to receive a verification code
Tooltips.phoneNumberJoin: Providing your phone number allows for SMS verification and enhanced security. This is optional but recommended
Tooltips.verificationCode: Enter the 6-digit verification code that was sent to your phone number via SMS
Tooltips.verificationCodeLogin: Enter the 6-digit verification code that was sent to your phone number
Tooltips.yourName: Your display name that will be shown to other residents in the building. Maximum 20 characters
Tooltips.yourNameLogin: Enter your display name as it appears in the building
Tooltips.buildingName: The name of your building or property. This will be used to identify your building to other residents. Maximum 20 characters
Tooltips.buildingInviteCode: The unique invitation code provided by the building owner. This code allows you to join the specific building
Tooltips.buildingInviteCodeLogin: Enter your building's invite code to identify which building you belong to
Tooltips.additionalDetailsCreate: Any additional information about yourself or the building that you'd like to share with other residents. This field is optional
Tooltips.additionalDetailsJoin: Any additional information about yourself that you'd like to share with other residents in the building. This field is optional
